Software Description: [OLDBAIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0138) is a credential harvester used by [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007). (Citation: FireEye APT28) (Citation: FireEye APT28 January 2017)
Mitigation Description: Use signatures or heuristics to detect malicious software.
Application: Consider utilizing the Antimalware Scan Interface (AMSI) on Windows 10 to analyze commands after being processed/interpreted.
Use: [OLDBAIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0138) obfuscates internal strings and unpacks them at startup.

Software Description: [OLDBAIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0138) is a credential harvester used by [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007). (Citation: FireEye APT28) (Citation: FireEye APT28 January 2017)
Mitigation Description: Enforce binary and application integrity with digital signature verification to prevent untrusted code from executing.
Use: [OLDBAIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0138) installs itself in %ALLUSERPROFILE%\\Application Data\Microsoft\MediaPlayer\updatewindws.exe; the directory name is missing a space and the file name is missing the letter "o."

Software Description: [OLDBAIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0138) is a credential harvester used by [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007). (Citation: FireEye APT28) (Citation: FireEye APT28 January 2017)
Mitigation Description: Block execution of code on a system through application whitelisting, blacklisting, and/or script blocking.
Application: Use tools that restrict program execution via whitelisting by attributes other than file name for common operating system utilities that are needed.
Use: [OLDBAIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0138) installs itself in %ALLUSERPROFILE%\\Application Data\Microsoft\MediaPlayer\updatewindws.exe; the directory name is missing a space and the file name is missing the letter "o."

Software Description: [OLDBAIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0138) is a credential harvester used by [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007). (Citation: FireEye APT28) (Citation: FireEye APT28 January 2017)
Mitigation Description: Use intrusion detection signatures to block traffic at network boundaries.
Application: Network intrusion detection and prevention systems that use network signatures to identify traffic for specific adversary malware can be used to mitigate activity at the network level.
Use: [OLDBAIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0138) can use HTTP or SMTP for C2.

Mitigation Description: Restrict access by setting directory and file permissions that are not specific to users or privileged accounts.
Application: Use file system access controls to protect folders such as C:\\Windows\\System32.
Use: [OLDBAIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0138) installs itself in %ALLUSERPROFILE%\\Application Data\Microsoft\MediaPlayer\updatewindws.exe; the directory name is missing a space and the file name is missing the letter "o."
